name: Pizza Margherita
description: Classic Italian pizza with fresh mozzarella and basil.

name: Vegan Burger
description: Plant-based burger patty served with lettuce, tomato, and vegan mayo.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
description: Romaine lettuce, grilled chicken breast, croutons, and parmesan cheese with Caesar dressing.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Italian pasta with creamy sauce, pancetta, and a sprinkle of parmesan cheese.

name: Mushroom Risotto
description: Creamy risotto cooked with assorted mushrooms and a hint of truffle oil.

name: Tom Yum Soup
description: Spicy Thai soup with shrimp, mushrooms, tomatoes, and lemongrass.

name: Beef Tacos
description: Three soft tacos filled with seasoned beef, salsa, cheese, and lettuce.

name: Falafel Wrap
description: Middle Eastern chickpea falafel with vegetables and tahini sauce in a wrap.

name: Peking Duck
description: Roasted duck served with pancakes, spring onions, cucumber, and hoisin sauce.

name: Fish and Chips
description: Beer-battered fish served with fries and tartar sauce.
